snippet.title: The Dragoness: Command of the Flame | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Venture into the war-torn realm of the Drairthir Peninsula, home of the regal Dragoness. Following a devastating civil war, the Dragoness has requested the aid of a veteran elvish Commander. Battle the wicked Shai-Va forces by building your army and harnessing the six schools of arcane magic to gain an edge in battle. 

The Dragoness: Command of the Flame mixes HOMM-like exploration, base-building and turn-based strategic combat, with a roguelite twist. Choose your battles, paths and skills as you explore a world ravaged by war. Gather and manage your army of beasts, collect resources and expand your city.

OUT NOW on Epic Games, GOG.com, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4 & Xbox Series X|S, and 7th September 2023 on Nintendo Switch!

Find out more: https://pqube.co.uk/games/the-dragoness/

OUT NOW on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1413580/The_Dragoness_Command_of_the_Flame/

Find out more: https://pqube.co.uk/games/the-dragoness/

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/
